revised_code.chunk:
diff --git a/java/code/src/com/redhat/rhn/domain/errata/ErrataFactory.java b/java/code/src/com/redhat/rhn/domain/errata/ErrataFactory.java
index 7b820f20f58..e4cdf2c819f 100644
--- a/java/code/src/com/redhat/rhn/domain/errata/ErrataFactory.java
+++ b/java/code/src/com/redhat/rhn/domain/errata/ErrataFactory.java

@@ -192,37 +186,35 @@ public class ErrataFactory extends HibernateFactory {
     }
 
     /**
-     * Takes a published or unpublished errata and publishes to a channel, creating
-     *      all of the correct ErrataFile* entries.  This method does push packages to
-     *      the appropriate channel. (Appropriate as defined as the channel previously
-     *      having a package with the same name).
-     * @param errataList list of errata to publish
-     * @param chan channel to publish it into.
-     * @param user the user doing the pushing
+     * Takes an errata and adds it to a channel, creating all of the correct ErrataFile* entries.
+     * This method does push packages to the appropriate channel. (Appropriate as defined as the
+     * channel previously having a package with the same name).
+     * @param errataList list of errata to add
+     * @param chan channel to add them to
+     * @param user the user adding errata to channel
      * @param inheritPackages include only original channel packages
-     * @return the published errata
+     * @return the added errata
      */
-    public static List<Errata> publishToChannel(List<Errata> errataList, Channel chan,
-            User user, boolean inheritPackages) {
-        return publishToChannel(errataList, chan, user, inheritPackages, true);
+    public static List<Errata> addToChannel(List<Errata> errataList, Channel chan,
+                                            User user, boolean inheritPackages) {
+        return addToChannel(errataList, chan, user, inheritPackages, true);
     }
 
     /**
-     * Takes a published or unpublished errata and publishes to a channel, creating

-     *      having a package with the same name).

-     * @param chan channel to publish it into.

+     * entries. This method does push packages to the appropriate channel.
+     * (Appropriate as defined as the channel previously having a package with the same name).

+     * @param chan channel to add them to
      * @param user the user doing the pushing
      * @param inheritPackages include only original channel packages
      * @param performPostActions true (default) if you want to refresh newest package
      * cache and schedule repomd regeneration. False only if you're going to do those
      * things yourself.
-     * @return the published errata
+     * @return the added errata
      */
-    public static List<Errata> publishToChannel(List<Errata> errataList, Channel chan,
-            User user, boolean inheritPackages, boolean performPostActions) {
+    public static List<Errata> addToChannel(List<Errata> errataList, Channel chan,

         List<com.redhat.rhn.domain.errata.Errata> toReturn = new ArrayList<Errata>();
         for (Errata errata : errataList) {
             errata.addChannel(chan);

timeline.bodyText: I'm confused with this one. The goal is to remove unpublished errata, but here we keep the code of the unpublished bugs and remove the code block for the published ones.
timeline.author: rjmateus

replies.bodyText:
I think the change is correct.
Original code said: if (copy.isPublished()) ... createNewPublishedBug ... else ... createNewUnpublishedBug
New code says: createNewPublishedBug
(assumption is it can't be unpublished, so it's always published)
replies.author: moio

timeline.bodyText: I think we can return the value directly in here.
timeline.author: rjmateus
rjmateus

timeline.bodyText: I know it's out of scope, but this is a super strange code. Create a list with one element, and then from the method returned list get the first element and call it again...

timeline.message: Drop UnpublishedErrata and some of the linked code
Drop isPublished() method and dependent code
getErrataChannelIntersection: drop redundant parameter and query
errata/edit.jsp: remove unused form for unpublished errata
Drop unpublished errata list page remnents
Drop unpublished errata delete pages and related code
Remove dropped context page from translations
Drop base class only used once
Drop references to rhnErrataTmp from Java code
Drop the Bug interface as it only had one concrete class
Drop the ClonedErrata interface as it only had one concrete class
Merge AbstractErrata onto the only child class PublishedErrata
Merge the Errata interface onto the only child class PublishedErrata
Merge the ErrataFile interface onto the only child class PublishedErrataFile
Refactoring: move Bug to parent package
Refactoring: move ClonedErrata to parent package
Refactoring: move Keyword to parent package

Refactoring: align URL with class name

Only the private method, public method will remain
Drop all Python references to rhnErrataTmp and related tables
